name: Gates of Paradise
description:
Demons are trying to get into Heaven!

It's your job as the Heaven's Gates to send the undercover demons back to hell while letting the good souls into paradise!

How to play

Left Click - Let the soul into heaven

Right Click - Banish the soul to Hell

To know who to banish back to hell look for features only a demon would have, such as a pointy red tail!

Tips: The faster you judge, the more points you get!

Authors

First Slime Games

Programming: Pascal Boardman (Protosev) Twitter

Arts: Marianne Richard Instagram
